div.div: at New Wilmington, Pa. | Harold Burry Stadium

tr.td: W&J wins toss defers; WES defends south goal.
Eric Eberle kickoff 67 yards to the WES3, Kyle Allen return 13 yards to the WES16 (Nathan Melhorn;Mickey Bednar).
Shawn Lehocky pass complete to John Proano for loss of 1 yard to the WES15 (Pat Fening).
Shawn Lehocky rush for 3 yards to the WES18 (Mitch Rose).
Shawn Lehocky rush for loss of 2 yards to the WES16 (Mitch Rose;Andy McGill).
Andrew Clark punt 38 yards to the W&J46, Alex Baroffio return 11 yards to the WES43 (Alex Kernicky).
Matt Bliss pass incomplete to Adam Dominick.
Matt Bliss pass complete to Hunter Creel for 39 yards to the WES4, 1ST DOWN W&J (Jordon Rooney).
Tim McNerney rush for 4 yards to the WES0, TOUCHDOWN, clock 12:11.
Eric Eberle kickoff 58 yards to the WES12, Kyle Allen return 10 yards to the WES22 (Mickey Bednar).
Shawn Lehocky pass incomplete to G. Pasquinelli, dropped pass.
John Proano rush for 3 yards to the WES25 (Erik Espe).
Shawn Lehocky rush for 5 yards to the WES30 (Neil Sorice).
